data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Luanda to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Luanda, Angola
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Luanda, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,512,503 believers in the state of Luanda.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 6,542,900 citizens of Luanda, Angola, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Chinese, general people.
God, we pray for the believers in Luanda, Angola to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Luanda, Angola to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Luanda, Angola.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
